Chara was walking alone in the underground, searching for something to do. She usually ended up all alone during this time of day, as Asriel was off with his friends, and Chara didn't have any of her own. She didn't mind this, but it didn't leave her with much to do.
That is, until one day, when she was caught by surprise by a strange ghost. He appeared before Chara, and startled her, causing her to fall off the bench she was sitting on and onto the ground.
"Oh... Sorry..." The ghost stated, "I didn't mean to bother you..."
Chara brushed herself off, "Well, you did. Mind moving your incorporeal butt elsewhere?" She asked.
"Alright... Sorry..." The ghost said with his head tilted down, "I was actually going to invite you to this thing, but... I can see you're busy."

Chara wanted to just let the ghost move on, but for once she felt a little... Bad. This ghost seemed so pathetic, that even she couldn't let the ghost go that easily. Besides, she had time to kill.
"Wait, hold on. What's your name?" Chara asked, moving towards the ghost.
"M-my name? Napstablook..." He responded, turning his head.
Chara felt she was going to regret this, but the words came out anyway, "I-I... Would like to hear more about what you're inviting me to."
"Well... Each year, me and my... F-friend, we would sit at home and eat human food. Remembering what it was like when we actually had bodies that could digest meals. Then afterwards, we would lay down and feel like trash." Napstablook responded, "But now, my friend apparently has other things they need to do, and won't be able to make it... So, I was hoping to find someone else to join me."
Chara smiled, "Well, that's lucky. I happen to be a human, actually."
"R-really? Maybe you could tell me what it's like to actually eat and digest food... I-If you're interested..."

Chara wasn't one to deny free food, and today was no exception. She agreed, and followed Napstablook home.
Chara had hoped that he agreement to come would change his mood, but it seemed he was still rather bummed. Not that she cared, but it kind of made her a bit bummed as well. At least she was getting some food out of it.

Chara and Napstablook eventually made it to Napsta's home, where he offered for Chara to sit down. He rummaged around in his fridge, and said, "I stockpiled tons of human food I manged to find in the dump. Don't worry, I cleaned them up and made them look practically just as good. So... Guests are first. You can have choice of the first meal."
Napstablook placed down three different foods, a Burger, a Cake and a Candy Bar.
Chara seemed a bit disappointed, "This is all? You made it seem like there was... A lot more."
"Oh, there is. I have tons of Burgers, Cakes and these chocolate bars. Just choose one, and I'll give you all of that food I have. The leftover food we'll both eat together." Napstablook mentioned.
Chara nodded, and began to choose her food...

15232213.content:
As Chara ate her heart out on all the burgers she could stuff herself with, she somehow ended up falling in. She didn't care, however, as it was much easier stuffing the burgers in her mouth while inside the dumpster than outside. But that's when she heard a loud beeping noise, a garbage truck had begun to do it's rounds and picked Chara's dumpster as it's first target. She got lifted up inside of the truck and fell into the back with all the other burgers. She was about to leave, but her hunger demanded her to stay right there until she finished all the food.
As the truck went around the underground, Chara was given more and more food to snack on, swallowing anything edible that the truck piled in. This made Chara grow even fatter much faster, swelling up until her clothes were practically painted onto her skin, stretching to their limits while she binged on all the food the truck provided.

Soon, she got dumped out in a massive pile of garbage, a field of trash as far as the eye could see. It was like heaven for Chara, and she wanted to get started immediately! The first thing she found was...

152331.content:
Chara is a 8 year old human girl. a snooty little brat who loved messing with others and had no respect for anyone.
Her mother Toriel spoiled her since while Chara was a brat Toriel still loved her.
But one day while Toriel was serving Chara breakfast something happened
Toriel had gotten some peanuts from a local monster store peanuts where new in the underground and Toriel thought serving Chara some tasty peanut sandwiches would be good. .

But the second Chara took a bite something was wrong "Chara? honey are you ok? you don't look so good"
Chara suddenly become reddish with her pale skin becoming light red all over. red dots began to show up on her skin and most of all her face swelled up like fat along with her belly arms legs and ass.
Chara was allergic to peanuts and made Chara swell up as a result.
152331.title: Chara is allergic to nuts

1523311.content:
Chara kept swelling up, filling her chair with her own gelatinous booty, clothes ripping apart from the weight, and it only seemed to be getting worse as the process sped up from there.
Toriel had no idea what to do, so she ran into the other room to search for a medical book. Unfortunately, they were only for Monsters, and she had no human medical books. Desperate, she decided the Monster one would have to do, and ran back into the room where Chara is to find her on the floor, her fat spreading across the floor and ripping out of her shorts.
Chara let out a sneeze, her whole body jiggling and surging further into the Kitchen. Toriel knew she had to act fast, so she found the first remedy spell she could find and casted it.

For a moment, after the spell was cast, it seemed it had worked. Chara stopped growing, and the redness had stopped spreading. She was still an obese blob, with more fat than she could reasonably lift up and move around with, but for now it seemed she was fine.
Just as Toriel was about to let out a sigh of relief,

15233112.content:
Chara seemed fine for a sec despite being a swollen little fatty. Toriel felt the crisis was over but then Toriel saw Chara becoming younger!
"Oh no my little girl! she shouted as Chara regressed into a newborn in seconds. now sitting on the floor was a fat bean bag chair sized red blob of a baby with a big head big eyes short hair and big chubby cheeks.

Chara began to cry as she was now fully a newborn again with her brat personality now gone. being a newborn she was getting used to her now swollen itchy body but little did both know this made things far worse as Chara's immune system was now so weak that the peanuts she was allergic too went into overdrive making her suddenly swell faster.
15233112.title: Chara began regressing in age!

152331123.content:
In Chara's rampant growth, she accidentally hit the counter and made an entire jar of peanuts fall into her mouth, force-feeding her each and every one until they were all stuffed down inside her, gulping down the waterfall of nuts until they were all consumed. With this she felt her belly rumble, and her fat body exploded with weight, spreading into other rooms so quick that Toriel hardly had any time at all to escape.

Toriel watched as her home was destroyed by the gigantic newborn blob that her daughter had become, growing out of control, nothing more than a heaving sack of red, sick fat. Toriel still had the book, there was still time to search for a cure before the entire underground became crushed beneath Chara's fat ass.
Toriel flipped through the book frantically, desperate for answers, and she eventually found a cure! This one was specifically for peanut allergies, and worked across all species, it was perfect! She jumped onto Chara's fat and began to recite the spell, and once she cast it...
